ai.summary: Bridleway V29 is a 9.4 km moderate hike in the UK, suitable for walkers seeking a steady day on a mix of rural paths. It avoids technical sections and is accessible to most fit walkers.
ai.terrain_summary: The route follows a well-trodden bridleway with occasional field edges and stiles. Expect mixed surfaces: compact gravel, grassy track, and potential mud after rain. Elevation changes are moderate, with gentle ascents and descents throughout.
ai.safety_notes: Plan for UK weather: check forecast and daylight hours. Wear sturdy boots and bring a waterproof outer layer, plus enough water and snacks. Carry a map or GPS and inform someone of your plans. In rural sections, livestock may be present; stay on marked paths and be cautious of uneven or slippery ground, especially after rain.

seo.title: Bridleway V29 – 9.4 km Moderate Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Bridleway V29, a 9.4 km moderate hike in the UK. Learn terrain, safety tips, and gear to plan your day.
